name: Bourbon Renewal
description: This recipe comes from Jeffrey Morgenthaler of Portland's Clyde Common. Sweet crème de cassis mixes with oaky bourbon to produce a delicious take on the classic whiskey sour.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce fresh juice from one lemon
1/2 ounce simple syrup (see note), or less to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Add bourbon, lemon, crème de cassis, simple syrup, and bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Old Fashioned glass.
